title: Vileda Tip Top Dish Washing Medium Foam Sponge Scourer 5 Pieces
raw_desc: Foam Backing: The Vileda TipTop Foam backing is designed to effectively produce suds and rinse easily with water, making dish washing and cleaning tasks easier and more efficient. Long-Lasting and Durable: Made of high-quality materials, the scouring pad and sponge are joined using a special method of adhesion. This ensures that the Vileda TipTop sponge scourer lasts for a fairly long time, providing reliable and consistent cleaning performance. Safe for Sensitive Surfaces: Always remember to test the pad on a non-visible area before using on particularly sensitive surfaces, to ensure that it does not cause any damage or scratches.
